p: Serum samples were tested for specific Dengue and Chikungunya IgM and IgG antibodies using the Anti-Dengue Virus IgM and IgG ELISA kits (Abcam, Cambridge, MA, USA) and Anti- Chikungunya Virus IgM and IgG ELISA kits (Abcam, Cambridge, MA, USA). The test procedures were done in accordance with manufacturerâ€™s instructions.
